title: Rehoboam’s Humbling
summary: When Rehoboam abandons God's law, Egypt invades Jerusalem. Rehoboam humbles himself, and God lessens the punishment, but the kingdom remains under tribute to Egypt as a result.

faq.question: What was God’s response to Rehoboam’s repentance?
faq.answer: He reduced the punishment, sparing total destruction.

faq.question: What lasting consequence came from Rehoboam’s disobedience?
faq.answer: Judah had to serve Egypt, showing they were not fully free.
